## ChildrenBehavior class

The runtime behavior for child node observation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class ChildrenBehavior extends NodeObservationBehavior<ChildrenBehaviorOptions> 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(target, options)](./fast-element.childrenbehavior._constructor_.md) |  | Creates an instance of ChildrenBehavior. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [disconnect()](./fast-element.childrenbehavior.disconnect.md) |  | Disconnects observation of the nodes. |
|  [getNodes()](./fast-element.childrenbehavior.getnodes.md) |  | Retrieves the nodes that should be assigned to the target. |
|  [observe()](./fast-element.childrenbehavior.observe.md) |  | Begins observation of the nodes. |
